member.name: T:SequentialGuid
member.summary: A safe managed sequential GUID generator (or Comb) that improves performance of GUID-style identifiers used in persistence.
member.devdoc: Source from NHibernate Guid Comb generator: http://nhibernate.svn.sourceforge.net/viewvc/nhibernate/trunk/nhibernate/src/NHibernate/Id/GuidCombGenerator.cs
